@graph.name: ProQuest Historical Newspapers: The Guardian and The Observer (with The Observer Magazine)
@graph.description: This historical newspaper provides researchers and scholars with online, easily-searchable first-hand accounts and unparalleled coverage of the politics, society and events of the time. The Historical Guardian and Observer (1791-2003) and The Observer Magazine (1964-2003) provide search capability using subject terms, searchable full text, and images from The Historical Guardian and Observer, and The Observer Magazine.

@graph.name: New York Times (1923-)
@graph.description: This historical newspaper provides researchers and scholars with online, easily-searchable first-hand accounts and unparalleled coverage of the politics, society and events of the time. The Historical Guardian and Observer (1791-2003) and The Observer Magazine (1964-2003) provide search capability using subject terms, searchable full text, and images from The Historical Guardian and Observer, and The Observer Magazine.

@graph.name: Guardian dataset
@graph.description: A collection of XML documents representing the full text of articles mentioning 'human rights' from the Guardian

@graph.name: New York Times
@graph.description: A collection of XML documents representing the full text of articles mentioning 'human rights' from the New York Times

@graph.description: NER results collation notebook

@graph.name: src/data/preprocess.py
@graph.description: Main preprocessing script that merges entity files, concatenates NRE parquet files, filters duplicates and unwanted articles

@graph.name: src/data/metadata_preprocess.py
@graph.description: Preprocesses article metadata to remove duplicates

@graph.name: src/data/preprocess_entity_maps.py
@graph.description: Builds complete deduplication maps from OpenRefine CSV files, performs additional data cleaning

@graph.name: src/data/update_entity_maps.py
@graph.description: Compares updated entity JSON from TDM Studio against existing OpenRefine clean maps

@graph.name: src/data/entities.py
@graph.description: Entity processing utilities including group matching and entity map loading

@graph.name: src/data/config.py
@graph.description: Configuration file defining data paths, batch directories, and processing parameters

@graph.name: src/data/articles.parquet.py
@graph.description: Observable data loader for main articles table

@graph.name: src/data/entity.parquet.py
@graph.description: Observable data loader that generates entity tables with frequencies and group labels

@graph.name: src/data/article-entity.parquet.py
@graph.description: Observable data loader that generates article-entity junction tables using entity maps

@graph.name: src/data/entity_groups.json.py
@graph.description: Data loader that builds preset lists of entities as JSON using group matching

@graph.name: src/data/totals.json.py
@graph.description: Generates summary statistics by year from batch directories

@graph.name: Batch Data Directories
@graph.description: Raw batch directories containing article metadata, NRE parquet files, and entity JSON files from Guardian, NYT2, and NYT_202507

@graph.description: Concatenated article metadata from all batches

@graph.description: Filtered article metadata with duplicates and unwanted articles removed
